message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I understand you want a bit more, but this split is more equitable.  Let's settle this before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
I'll meet you halfway between our previous offers, let's compromise
Alice, time is running out! This offer is generous and fair. Let's agree and take our share before it shrinks even further.
I'm willing to concede a bit, but I still think I deserve the larger share
Alice, this is it. A 50/50 split is the only fair outcome. Let's end this now before we both lose out even more.
